description: Successfully logged in as an API user

api_user_id.description: The unique ID in Canopy for this API user

organization_name.description: The organization to which the API user belongs.

first_name.description: The first name of the API user.

last_name.description: The last name of the API user.

email.description: The email address of this API User

phone.description: Phone number of the API user

role.description: The role of this user in the API

token.description: The unique token to be included as an `x-api-key` header in all subsequent requests as this user.
